ModMetaData.name: Construction Breakup
ModMetaData.author: br410bury
ModMetaData.description:
Break construction tasks into logical sub-units.
Breaks up and modifies the Construction work type in the following manner: • Moves repairing tasks to a new work type called Repair • Moves deconstruction tasks to a new work type called Deconstruct. • Adds a work type called Deliver that commands pawns to deliver resources to construction projects¹
1: These are not moved out of the Construction work type so a pawn set to construct will also deliver items to construction projects as needed as well.
